item.title: Ninja 500
item.description:
Story

I’ve always wanted a motorcycle, and I finally decided to get one. Now that I’m a bit older, I’ve got the self-control not to do anything crazy with it.

item.title: Miata
item.description: I own and drive a 2021 Mazda MX-5 RF GT (Miata). This is my first daily driven stick shift car, and it’s so fun to drive!
